content: {"name": "Christ the King Church Food Pantry - A Second Harvest Agency", "alternate_name": "", "description": "need to register online for Upcoming Pop Up Food Shares nourish up https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeSxJDTKeU0TiJEjKYAUJxKK9Ql98UDuaWw15hxhfjrbpn7MA/viewform?vc=0&c=0&w=1&flr=0 \nOn the 3rd Wednesday of the month, the food is distributed in partnership with Loaves & Fishes, and pre-registration is required at https://ctkcharlotte.org/events/loaves-and-fishes/ so they know how many boxes to prepare. You can visit without registering on the 1st, 2nd, and 4th Wednesday of the month.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.ctkcharlotte.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "13501 South Tryon Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Charlotte", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28278", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.0975593, "longitude": -80.99668059999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 587-0073", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
